title: First Celebrities Settle Lawsuit Over FTX Deals
description: Among those who agreed to settle were Jacksonville Jaguars quarterback Trevor Lawrence, and YouTube influencers Tom Nash and Kevin Paffrath.

title: PolkaWorld Hits Pause as Founder Faults Polkadot Governance Change
description: At the center of the controversy is a new structure that grants every token holder a vote.

title: Japanese crypto exchange JPEX to pause interest rewards as partners freeze funds
description:
The Japan-based crypto exchange JPEX said it will pause a key feature at the start of the week in an announcement published Sept. 17. JPEX said that it will delist all Earn Trading transactions on Sept. 18. Much like other staking or earn services, this feature allowed users to deposit assets and provide liquidity in […]

The post Japanese crypto exchange JPEX to pause interest rewards as partners freeze funds appeared first on CryptoSlate.

title: Hong Kong crypto exchange JPEX faces liquidity crisis amid regulatory scrutiny
description: JPEX, a Hong Kong-based cryptocurrency trading platform, is grappling with a severe liquidity crisis after its third-party market makers “maliciously froze” the company’s funds. The crisis has forced JPEX to delist all transactions on its Earn Trading interface, effective September 18, 2023, at 00:00 (GMT+8). While existing Earn orders will continue until their respective end ... Read more
